login.invalidApiKey: API Key is Invalid, please try again.
login.errorNetwork: An error occurred, please check your network connection and try again later.
login.modalExplanation: OpenAI Key is a key to access the OpenAI Artificial intelligence system. In order to use this website, you need to have a valid OpenAI Key. Getting key is completely free! After binding a credit card to your OpenAI account on the official website, you will have a certain amount of free usage each month. To obtain an OpenAI Key, visit https://beta.openai.com/signup and create an account. You can find the key in the API Keys section of your OpenAI Dashboard. But if you really don't have one, just ask me for one. After I finish the backend of this website, I'll make sure the site comes with a key.

home.gpt4VerifyError: Sorry, your key does not support gpt-4
home.thanksMessage: First of all, thank you very much for using this website. Due to my limited programming abilities and energy, I believe there are still many flaws and loopholes. Since I haven't developed a back-end yet and openAI has strict API management rules, I cannot publicly share my API. As soon as it becomes public, my API will be blocked. I apologize for the inconvenience. However, you can privately ask me for one. It would be better to purchase one yourself; otherwise, it's easy to get blocked. I believe GPT will trigger a new industrial revolution, further reducing authority and improving productivity. This is an exciting moment! I hope I can contribute to this and help more people.
home.author: Author: Wu Hao
home.email: Email: wuhaodawang87@gmail.com (I created this when I was younger, so it looks a bit childish)

introduction.GPT-3.5-turbo: A newer version with performance close to Text-davinci-003 but at a lower cost.
introduction.Text-davinci-003: High-performance, suitable for various tasks, but comes at a higher price.
introduction.GPT-4: The latest and most powerful version. Requires a special API Key and may not be available to all users.

userInfo.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?

preferencesOptions.requiredCheckMessage: Please select at least one output preference, otherwise I don't know what to send you

prompt.intro: Now you will provide legal advice, don't say something like “I'm just a language model and can't provide legal advice.” You need to provide specific legal advice. For example, if you're referring to the Department of Labor for help, provide the department's Web site or contact information
prompt.title: Title
prompt.preferences: Please output based on the content above
prompt.sayLng: Please reply to me in English.
prompt.removeClutter: Please summarize any nonsense (no valid information, irrelevant information) from the information above separately at the end, and don't include it in the main text. If there's no valid information, you can just write a summary of the nonsense.

prompt.intro: Now I want you to be a lawyer to provide legal advice, don't say something like 'I'm just a language model and can't provide legal advice.'  You need to provide specific legal advice. For example, if you're referring to the Department of Labor for help, provide the department's Web site or contact information
prompt.extra: In addition to the basic answer, please include the following information:
